solution_line_template: Let’s first calculate what the apple trees produce: {num_apple_trees} trees * {kg_per_apple_tree} kg/tree = <<{num_apple_trees}*{kg_per_apple_tree}={total_apple_kg}>>{total_apple_kg} kg
Then let's calculate what the peaches produce: {num_peach_trees} trees * {kg_per_peach_tree} kg/tree = <<{num_peach_trees}*{kg_per_peach_tree}={total_peach_kg}>>{total_peach_kg} kg
We add these two masses: {total_apple_kg} kg + {total_peach_kg} kg = <<{total_apple_kg}+{total_peach_kg}={total_fruit_mass}>>{total_fruit_mass} kg
